scripts.build: build(){ [ -d $1 ] && rm -r $1; mkdir $1; cp src/view/index.html $1/index.html; browserify --debug src/view/Canvas.js -o $1/Canvas.js; }; build
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src -e html,js,css --exec npm run build build & http-server ./build -o -a localhost -c-1
scripts.gitpage: npm run build docs GoogleAnalytics; cp src/view/googleAnalytics.js docs
